actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to redesignate the Office of Commissioner of the District of Columbia as Mayor of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Provides for the designation of the office of Commissioner of the District of Columbia as the office of Mayor of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to redesignate the Office of Commissioner of the District of Columbia as Mayor of the District of Columbia.
